BeginCount.description: number of times a player 'began' the level. [count of 'BEGIN' events]

CompleteCount.description: number of times a player 'completed' the level. [count of 'COMPLETE' events]

Completed.description: whether the level was completed or not [bool whether 'COMPLETE' event was found]

MenuBtnCount.description: number of times the player returned to the main menu. [count of 'MENU_BUTTON' events]

SucceedCount.description: number of times a 'SUCCEED' event occurs. [count of 'SUCCEED' events]

TotalFails.description: number of 'Fail' events across a level

TotalLevelTime.description: time spent on a level [sum of differences in time between 'BEGIN' and 'COMPLETE' event(s)]

TotalResets.description: number of times the user pressed the 'reset' button across a level

TotalSkips.description: number of times the player chose to skip the level (only allowed if they already completed the level once)

AmplitudeGoodMoveCount.description: number of amplitude moves that brought amplitude closer to the correct value

OffsetGoodMoveCount.description: number of offset moves that brought offset closer to the correct value

WavelengthGoodMoveCount.description: number of wavelength moves that brought wavelength closer to the correct value

FirstMoveType.description: A character indicating what type of slider move a player made first. A = Amplitude, W = Wavelength, O = Offset, null = No moves

PercentAmplitudeMoves.description: percent of total moves that were amplitude adjustments in a level

PercentOffsetMoves.description: percent of total moves that were offset adjustments in a level

PercentWavelengthMoves.description: percent of total moves that were wavelength adjustments in a level

PercentAmplitudeGoodMoves.description: percent of amplitude moves that brought amplitude closer to the correct value

PercentOffsetGoodMoves.description: percent of wavelength moves that brought wavelength closer to the correct value

PercentWavelengthGoodMoves.description: percent of wavelength moves that brought wavelength closer to the correct value

SliderAverageRange.description: difference between max and min values of a slider move, averaged together across a level

SliderAverageStandardDeviations.description: Average of stdev_val for all slider moves in a level

TotalArrowMoves.description: arrow moves across a given level [count of 'ARROW_MOVE_RELEASE' events]

TotalSliderMoves.description: slider moves across a given level [count of 'SLIDER_MOVE_RELEASE' events]

TotalMoveTypeChanges.description: number of times the player changes between 'Arrow' and 'Slider' move types across a level

ClosenessSlope.description: The slope of the linear regression line of (closeness vs. time (seconds)) for the level

ClosenessIntercept.description: The intercept of the linear regression line of (closeness vs. time (seconds)) for the level

ClosenessR2.description: The R^2 of the linear regression line of (closeness vs. time (seconds)) for the level

RangeSlope.description: The slope of the linear regression line of (range vs. time (seconds)) for the level, where range is the total range of moves (max-min in the case of a slider, abs(begin-end) in case of an arrow)

RangeIntercept.description: The intercept of the linear regression line of (range vs. time (seconds)) for the level, where range is the total range of moves (max-min in the case of a slider, abs(begin-end) in case of an arrow)

RangeR2.description: The R^2 of the linear regression line of (range vs. time (seconds)) for the level, where range is the total range of moves (max-min in the case of a slider, abs(begin-end) in case of an arrow)

QuestionAnswered.description: The answer the user gave to a given question (or -1 if unanswered)

QuestionCorrect.description: 0 if user answered the question incorrectly, 1 if answered correctly, -1 if unanswered

TimeToAnswerMS.description: The time, in milliseconds, taken by the player before answering the question

SequenceLevel.description: Sequence of slider interactions (e.g. 'wow' for Wavelength, Offset, Wavelength)

SessionID.description: The player's session ID number for this play session

PersistentSessionID.description: The session ID for the player's device, persists across multiple players using the same device.

OverallPercentAmplitudeMoves.description: Percent of total moves that were amplitude adjustments over a whole session

OverallPercentOffsetMoves.description: Percent of total moves that were offset adjustments over a whole session

OverallPercentWavelengthMoves.description: Percent of total moves that were wavelength adjustments over a whole session

OverallSliderAverageRange.description: Average range of slider moves over a whole session

OverallSliderAverageStandardDeviations.description: Average standard deviation of slider moves over a whole sessioin
